name: sops
description: Installs sops binary from GitHub release tarball and adds it to the global PATH. Supporting packages age and GnuPG will be added to the container if not already present.

version.description: The specific version to install; default value is 'latest' which will install the most recent available GitHub release of sops. NOTE: If a version is provided and a matching GitHub Release can not be found the feature will fail.

installAgeAndGnuPG.description: When true (default), ensure that age and GnuPG packages are installed in container.
